text: Ezerovo (Bulgarian: Езерово) is a village in Beloslav Municipality, Varna Province, north-eastern Bulgaria.Guide Bulgaria, Accessed 8 November 2014 As of September 2015 the village has a population of 1843.http://www.grao.bg/tna/tab02.txt ==References== Category:Villages in Varna Province
title: Ezerovo, Varna Province
